titleStmt.title: Wit and drollery joviall poems / corrected and much amended, with new additions, by Sir J.M. ... Sir W.D. ... and the most refined wits of the age.
titleStmt.author: Phillips, John, 1631-1706.
E. M.
J. M.

notesStmt.note: This work is based on a 1656 edition which was edited by John Phillips. Cf. BM.
Error in paging: p. 97-104 repeated in numbering only.
